Name: P6-LR Sniper Rifle
Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Sniper Rifle
Class: Ballistic

Magazine Size: 8
Rate Of Fire: 20 rpm
Effective Range: 120 m

Attachments: Optics (S3), Barrel (S2), Underbarrel (S2)

The Behring P6-LR ballistic sniper rifle more than makes up for its slow rate of fire with a high powered 8mm round that's effective from long range. Featuring a scope with variable zoom modes and a barrel composed of a proprietary high-strength alloy, the P6-LR was designed to deliver when needed most.
